Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1000 N WEST STREET,SUITE 1200, WILMINGTON, Delaware, 19801, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Acorn Energy Inc is a holding company which focuses on technology-driven solutions for energy infrastructure asset management. It operates through two segments namely, the PG segment and the CP segment. PG segment provides wireless remote monitoring and control systems and services for critical assets as well as Internet of Things applications which account for most of the revenue. CP segment is engaged in providing remote monitoring of cathodic protection systems on gas pipelines for gas utilities and pipeline companies.
